amendment.description: To reinstate grants to improve the mental health of children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2171, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 39. Record Vote Number: 239.

action.text: Amendment SA 2171 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104, S5115-5116; text: CR S5099) To reinstate grants to improve the mental health of children.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2171, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 39. Record Vote Number: 239.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2171, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 39. Record Vote Number: 239.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2171 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 2089.
